inclusion.criterion: Age between 6 months and 6 years, male and female.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: P. falciparum parasitemia (greater than or equal to 10,000 trophozoites/microliter).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Clinical syndrome consistent with malaria associated with documented fever (axillary temperature greater than or equal to 38 degrees C) or reported history of fever in the last 48 hours with no other cause present.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Mixed infection with P. falciparum and any other malaria species (P. malariae, P. ovale, P. vivax).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Co-infection with any other organism identified (ie. Positive blood culture).
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis and CSF leak, which may indicate an increased risk of complications from malaria treatment.
